content.query:
SET showplan_xml OFF
GO;

-- Drop staging table if it exists
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.tables WHERE name = 'staging_agencycompensation')
DROP TABLE staging_agencycompensation;

-- Create staging table
CREATE TABLE staging_agencycompensation (
    Level_Clustered NVARCHAR(100),
    Head_Count INT NOT NULL,
    Team_Performance DECIMAL(30,2),
    Management_Commission DECIMAL(30,2), 
    Fixed_Salary DECIMAL(30,2), 
    Commission DECIMAL(30,2),
    Total_Sales DECIMAL(30,2), 
    Total DECIMAL(30,2)
)
WITH (
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
    HEAP
);

-- Drop fact table if it exists
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.tables WHERE name = 'fact_agencycompensation')
DROP TABLE fact_agencycompensation;

-- Create fact table
CREATE TABLE fact_agencycompensation (
    Level_Clustered NVARCHAR(100),
    Head_Count INT NOT NULL,
    Team_Performance DECIMAL(30,2),
    Management_Commission DECIMAL(30,2), 
    Fixed_Salary DECIMAL(30,2), 
    Commission DECIMAL(30,2),
    Total_Sales DECIMAL(30,2), 
    Total DECIMAL(30,2)
)
WITH (
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
);
